tool_description: HealthWise API is a free API that offer data about more than more than 230 disease, and arround 160 symptom.
name: HealthWise
title: HealthWise

api_list.name: GetAssociatedDiseases
api_list.description:
Get common diseases for an organ

|  2 | eyes           |
|  3 | ears           |

api_list.name: GetMainBodyParts
api_list.description:
Get main body parts,
+ Head
+ Upperbody
+ Lowerbody
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://healthwise.p.rapidapi.com/body"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "healthwise.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://healthwise.p.rapidapi.com/body"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "healthwise.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetBodyOrgans
api_list.description:
Get specefic body part's organs.
Parameter: {part} :
|  1 | head      |
|  2 | upperbody |
|  3 | lowerbody |
